sentences.sentence: Objective: to study the clinical features of chronic subdural haematomas in elderly patients.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究老年人慢性硬脑膜下血肿的临床特点。

sentences.sentence: Fianu et al. studied the effect of MPS cream on experimentally induced haematomas in rabbits.
sentences.translation: Fianu等人研究了多磺酸粘多糖软膏对于实验人造血肿的作用，受试对象为兔。

sentences.sentence: The haematomas were produced by intracutaneous injection of autologous blood on the back of the animals.
sentences.translation: 血肿是通过在动物背部皮内注射自体血液造成的。
